text:
The DBDParams line shows "dbname=htpasswd user=apache password=xxxxxx", the
DBDParams page indicates the password variable should use "pass" not "password".
 This is specific to mysql.  The DBDParams page is correct.  If you use
"password", apache is unable to connect to the database.
creator: rmorgan@portmorgan.com
nick@webthing.com
text: The example is for PostgreSQL, not MySQL.
